#labels Featured

*Note* Some old plugins from this list will not be working in the latest
builds of Far 3. Updated plugins were moved to [https://github.com/Maximus5/FarPlugins GitHub].

===List of Far Manager plugins (hosted on this project)===
  * [ClipFixer ClipFixer]
  * [FARSelector FAR Selector]
  * [Far3Wrapper FAR2->Far3 wrapper] (is not working in the latest Far3)
  * [FarWDS FarWDS]
  * [FileTypes FileTypes]
  * [ImpEx ImpEx (PE format browser)]
  * [MBlockEditor MBlockEditor]
  * [MMView Multimedia Viewer]
  * [PicView Picture View 2]
  * [QSearchSwitch QSearchSwitch]
  * [RegEditor RegEditor]
  * [Resolve Resolve]
  * [DirSync Synchronize Directory]
  * [UnInstall UnInstall]
